title: क्या दशकों बाद श्रीनगर का शंकराचार्य मंदिर महाशिवरात्रि पर रोशनी से जगमगाया?
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: A disclaimer for all: J&K Dharmarth Trust has been celebrating Maha Shivratri for several decades at Shankaracharya Mandir, Srinagar. The lighting & decorations are done by the Trust every year and all claims of 30 years of darkness at this historic Temple are False. https://t.co/kyecfvKCec
